train package¶

Submodules¶

train.train module¶

This module handles training and validation task

train.train.train_model(config)[source]¶

The method loads the training data, performs test_train split. Trains the specific type of model with specific hyperparameters (as selected in config) and saves the test results at specified output directory. For additional configuration info, look up documentation of config.yaml

train.train_test_split module¶

This module handles training-validation split related tasks

train.train_test_split.split_by_date(run_id, train_fname, split_date)[source]¶

The method splits the training data by date

train.train_test_split.split_by_file(run_id, train_fname, test_fname)[source]¶

The method splits the training data by file

Module contents¶

The module for training and validation

train This module handles training and validation task
train_test_split This module handles training-validation split related tasks
